author: ehu
msg: Implement reverting after svn cp URL PATH replacements.

text base and prop base to text and prop revert file.

author: sussman
msg: Teach mod_dav_svn to list SVNParentPath contents in a web browser.
This is controlled by a new 'SVNListParentPath' directive which, for
obvious security reasons, is 'off' by default.  If 'on', then only
child directories of SVNParentPath (presumably repositories) will be
listed in the html (or xml) response.
Note that this feature only works with http GET, not with 'svn ls'
(PROPFIND), nor with svnserve.  Those might be future improvements.
This change passes 'make davcheck' with the directive both 'on' and 'off'.
(get_parentpath_resource):  new helper func to build new private resource.
(dav_svn_get_resource): look for an incoming SVNParentPath, and then
(dav_svn_deliver): notice the new type of private resource, and list
(some of) the contents of the *real* directory.
